org.apache.flex.swf.tags

Class DefineTextTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
      • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.CharacterTag
        • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DefineTextTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterReferrer, ICharacterTag, ITag
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefineText2Tag

    public class DefineTextTag
extends CharacterTag
implements ICharacterReferrer
    Represents a DefineText tag in a SWF file.

    The DefineText tag defines a block of static text. It describes the font, size, color, and exact position of every character in the text object.
